Matt Pringle - Photography

Saturday, June 22, 2013

I discovered photographer, Matt Pringle while trying to find inspiration on Flickr for photos that had been taken with the Minolta Autocord TLR.

I was really impressed and quite taken aback by his subject matter and choice of imagery. I really love the smooth tones and ghostly scenes of the photos taken with a pinhole camera, they are just fantastic, definately inspirational!

Scotland sure looks like a pretty bleak place...

Matt Pringle - Flickr
